== Teekoy (628122) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Teekoy is a village in the [[Meenachil]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 3227 hectares and harbouring 2181 households with total population of 9418 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palai]] is at a distance of 18 km. Male population is 4792 and female population is 4626. Scheduled Caste Population is 339 and Scheduled Tribes population is 332. Census Location Code of the village is 628122<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 8293 (88.05%)
* Literate male population: 4257 (88.84%)
* Literate female population: 4036 (87.25%)
